body:
Hey, you know that I'm someone who enjoys defending. Today I have decided to make such a good defence and share it on forums. 

So basically it's more useful for ground rushers but I thought that it's pretty useful. I'm also thinking on something like AntiSky version of this. Here is the photos!

https://gyazo.com/a167289304b1d095654f0a49aee43542
https://gyazo.com/ac816b7b5c1691799f563921c43155cd
https://gyazo.com/c9f6f2e5786dec86d9b0f9e5019b4c47
https://gyazo.com/7468f75a9e5b7522d0f764728dda0033

And feedback is really important for me. Honestly, bad comments are more important for me. Make sure that these bad comments will improve me more. Just tell me what to do =P

title: Defence  Tactics on Rendezvous 3.5

replies.body: Really easy to break if a Team make such a good push but if not its really usefull..
replies.body_tagged: Really easy to break if a Team make such a good push but if not its really usefull..

replies.body: Quick small improvement. On the very last fences surrounding the monument. Try placing pressure plates or slabs so they can't place on it.
replies.body_tagged: Quick small improvement. On the very last fences surrounding the monument. Try placing pressure plates or slabs so they can't place on it.

replies.body: Don't use signs, they are really easy to break and slabs / pressure plates are much easier to craft and place in large quantities faster.
replies.body_tagged: Don't use signs, they are really easy to break and slabs / pressure plates are much easier to craft and place in large quantities faster.

replies.body: Looks like a nice defence =)
replies.body_tagged: Looks like a nice defence =)

replies.body: Cover with crafting tables to the bedrock fence. Buttons on every wall
replies.body_tagged: Cover with crafting tables to the bedrock fence. Buttons on every wall

replies.body: Remember you can place buttons on the ground - they are hard to break unless the enemies have water
replies.body_tagged: Remember you can place buttons on the ground - they are hard to break unless the enemies have water

replies.body: The reason why I used signs and fences is, it makes it harder to break 4 signs and place woods there. While a rusher doing these, we can bow them easily. Can you please explain me why you didn't like it? And please remember that a good team push can get every single defense. That's why it's mostly about defenders pvp skills :) do not forget

replies.body: Very nice defence man, keep the good work!
replies.body_tagged: Very nice defence man, keep the good work!

replies.body:
If you were considering this for a competitive match then I'm sorry, but it's way overdone. I for one enjoy creating 'dream defences' when bored. As a defender you must accept the fact that all defences are beatable; it's just how long you can hold them off for. Make a quick mon defence, fence perimeter, pressure floor at the back and then work on removing the walls and creating a water fall. 
Nice ideas! :)

.

replies.body: On RendDTM I just usually put iron blocks on the monument, slab it, button it, put slabs over the floor upcto to the wall of the the tunnel, put fences around it, and try and break the wall but 2 layers with fences ontop. Not the best defence but it does the job and it's pretty quick to do

Not the best defence but it does the job and it's pretty quick to do

replies.body: Yeah. I know that every defense can get beaten verse an OPRushTeam. But you know, there are always going to be someone defending and what defences do is, making rushers waste time. For that reason I have made that defence.
